title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.3 - Permit application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.3 - Permit application requirements

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise exempt, a NDM handling
and recovery facility that is not subject to the registration provisions of
section
361-9.2
of this Subpart must obtain
a permit, and must submit an application that includes the requirements
identified in section
360.16
of this Title and a
description of how the facility will comply with the operating requirements in

Part 360.19 of this Title and this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-9.3

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
